title: Ivory Hunter - aka Where No Vultures Fly (1951 - UK) adventure
description:
This movie has a sequal - West of Zanzibar 1954
___________________________________________________________________________________

Ivory Hunter (1951 - UK)                                aka Where No Vultures Fly

Drama / Adventure
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0043682/


National Board of Review USA - WON - Top Foreign Films

Made by Ealing Studios in East Africa

This was the second most popular film at the British box office in 1952.

Inspired by the true story of the work of conservationist Mervyn Cowie, and set in East Africa, the film is about a game warden called Bob Payton. He is horrified by the destruction of wild animals by ivory hunters so he establishes a wildlife sanctuary. He is attacked by wild animals and must contend with a villainous ivory poacher.


Video: DivX5, 580x480, 29.970 fps, 1001 Kbps, 01h43m02s
Audio: MP3, 44100 Hz, dual mono, 128 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
